title: Essential Resources for Digital Literacy & Tech Fluency
description: Curated tools, guides, and community links to help you skill up in digital literacy, coding, cybersecurity, and creative tech. Each resource is crafted or selected to empower your journey as a digital creator and security-aware technologist in 2025 and beyond.

items.title: Internet Basics & Online Safety (PDF)
items.description: Understand how the internet works, protect your privacy, and navigate the web securely.

items.title: freeCodeCamp Developer Curriculum
items.description: From HTML and JS to backend and data structures, freeCodeCamp is your friend for full-stack self-teaching.

items.title: Creative Coding with p5.js (PDF + Project Templates)
items.description: Learn to express yourself with code using the p5.js library. Art, design, and interactivity combined.

timestamps.title: How to Think Like a Hacker

items.title: Digital Sovereignty Workbook (Download)
items.description: Reflective workbook helping you align digital habits with values, tech stack with sovereignty.

items.title: KODEX Discord
items.description: Join our cyber-zen crew to stay inspired, get support, and share your builds.

items.title: Digital Garden of Tools & Templates (Notion)
items.description: A living database of rituals, creative tech templates, and flow systems for learning in rhythm.

completion.message: 🌱 You've explored the core resources. Which ones will you plant into your learning garden?
completion.post_cta: Share which resource helped you most in the KODEX Forum or suggest your own.

forum_devlog_template.title: Reflections on Digital Literacy & Learning
forum_devlog_template.body_placeholder: Which resources resonated most? What did you explore or build after diving in?
